players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night and found out he's one of them."
Charlie: "Bob is suspicious because he didn't say anything about the murder last night."

Bob: "I believe we should focus on finding the real killer among us and not jump to conclusions based on investigations. Let's work together as a team to gather more information before making any decisions."

Bob: "Let's not forget that we still don't have enough information to make an accurate accusation. I suggest we continue investigating each other and share our findings openly to help us identify the real killer among us."
You: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night and found out he's one of them."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso and I think we should lynch him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Bob was arrested
